subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade returned from a two-game absence, LeBron James had 14 rebounds to lead a rejuvenated effort on the boards, and the Heat ended a two-game losing streak.
snippet: Dwyane Wade returned from a two-game absence, LeBron James had 14 rebounds to lead a rejuvenated effort on the boards, and the Heat ended a two-game losing streak.
